artist: Artist: José Guadalupe Posada; Printer: Taller de Grafica Popular, Mexico City; Publisher: La Estampa Mexicana, Mexico
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: standing clown pulling his baggy knickers away from his body at each hip; clown wears pointed cap and horizontally striped socks and stands in front of a curtain with tassels at right; text above and below figure: "EL CLOWN MEXICANO / GUADERO / No. 6 / PUBLICADO / POR / A. VANEGAS ARROYO. / MEXICO. POSADA"
portfolio: From 25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2017.
title: El Clown Mexicano (Mexican Clown), plate 1 from "25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada"
